SELECT QPM.pro_name, QPM.${crewNum}_modele_id as modele_id FROM quality_proportioning_message AS QPM INNER JOIN quality_proportioning_model AS QPMD ON QPM.id = QPMD.message_id WHERE QPM.${crewNum}_modele_id IN (SELECT produce_proportioning_num FROM quality_monitoring_realtime_${crew} WHERE produce_date BETWEEN '${startDate}' AND '${endDate}' GROUP BY produce_proportioning_num HAVING count(Id) > 20) AND YEAR(QPMD.create_time) = YEAR('${startDate}')
